subject: Poker (Card Game)
lead_paragraph: Jamie Gold apologized for his previously undisclosed antics during the $10,000 buy-in No-Limit Texas Hold ’Em tournament — antics that might have resulted in penalties if he had been caught.
snippet: Jamie Gold apologized for his previously undisclosed antics during the $10,000 buy-in No-Limit Texas Hold ’Em tournament — antics that might have resulted in penalties if he had been caught.
